trans-unit.source: Represents a key identifier clause that is based on XML.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma cláusula de identificador de chave que é baseada em XML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause" />.

trans-unit.source: The XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML que representa a cláusula de identificador de chave.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> class by using the specified XML element.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> usando o elemento XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A> property is initialized to `null` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength%2A> property is initialized to zero in the new instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A> propriedade é inicializada para `null` e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength%2A> propriedade é inicializada para zero na nova instância.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="referenceXML" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="referenceXML" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML que representa a cláusula de identificador de chave.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> que contém o nonce que foi usado para criar uma chave derivada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that is returned by the <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor retornado pelo método <see cref="M:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce" />.

trans-unit.source: The size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da chave derivada.

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Define o valor da propriedade <see cref="P:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> class by using the specified XML element, nonce, and derivation length.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause" /> usando o elemento XML especificado, o nonce e o comprimento de derivação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A> property is initialized to `null` in the new instance.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ClauseType%2A> propriedade é inicializada para `null` na nova instância.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="referenceXML" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="referenceXML" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier clause to which to compare current instance.
trans-unit.target: A cláusula de identificador de chave com a qual comparar a instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether specified key identifier clause matches the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um valor que indica se a cláusula de identificador de chave especificada corresponde à instância atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified key identifier clause matches the current instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a cláusula de identificador de chave especificada corresponde à instância atual; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For the match to succeed, the specified key identifier clause must be assignable from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause> and its markup (XML) must match that of this instance.
trans-unit.target: Para a correspondência seja bem-sucedida, a cláusula de identificador de chave especificado deve ser atribuível de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause> que esta instância deve coincidir com a sua marcação (XML).

trans-unit.source: (The <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A> property of the element specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml%2A> property is compared for the two instances.)
trans-unit.target: (O <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.OuterXml%2A> propriedade do elemento especificado pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.GenericXmlSecurityKeyIdentifierClause.ReferenceXml%2A> propriedade é comparada para as duas instâncias.)

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento XML que representa a cláusula de identificador de chave.

trans-unit.source: The XML element that represents the key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: O elemento XML que representa a cláusula de identificador de chave.
